businessProfile.name: Hall's Kitchen Pizza and Subs
businessProfile.address: 902 S Twyckenham Dr, South Bend, IN 46615, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 902 S Twyckenham Dr, South Bend, IN 46615, USA

reviews.text:
Stopped here for a late dinner after visiting the Potawatomi Zoo. Nice little restaurant, lots of options to choose from. Different pizzas, subs and pastas. Kids Mac n cheese is big enough to share!! Cheesy and flavorful. Lady was nice enough to put our 2yr olds in the freezer for a few to cool down. Also gave all 3 of our girls popsicles. Basket of garlic bread was also very too.
We got the chicken bacon ranch, chicken Alfredo and supreme pizzas. Everything was very tasty, cheesy and flavorful. Hope to stop again in the future...!!

Been eating their pizza for years and decided to hook them up with a review üôÇ.  I love their pizza. I love their prices. I love their pastas. I love their sauces. I love that it‚Äôs always hot when it shows up. I love that I decided not to use proper grammar and neglected to throw some commas in this review. Keep up the great work Hall‚Äôs Kitchen üëèüëèüëè.

Toppings on this pizza: Hand Tossed Build Your       Own Pizza 14‚Äù

Pizza Sauce
Green Peppers
Tomatoes
Banana Peppers
Spinach
Mikes Hot Honey Drizzle

Not only do I love Halls Kitchen, my entire family does. A few of my favorites are the taco pizza (pictured), sandwiches, their gluten free pasta with meatballs, and breadsticks. All around the pizza is delicious, we‚Äôve never had a bad order that I can recall.

They don‚Äôt deliver to my area however it‚Äôs worth the drive each time.

There is almost no toppings on the pizza i had sausage bacon and onion and it's 70% cheese. The pizza isn't anything special you folks in southbend must be used to trash. The wings are the worst Ive ever had it was rubbery like Tyson's chicken! Are we not gonna fry them at all? Im from out of state and this was worst 50$ Ive ever spent. Sad too cuz I wanted a go to out here.

First time visit at 10 p.m. Wow, this restaurant had the most wonderful pizza and bread sticks! Unique flavors that were really tasty. We will definitely go back. We drove over from the far west side of South Bend. We'll worth the trip! We love thin cracker crust on a pizza and they delivered that special crunch. Tomato sauce was extra good.

If you've never tried them, please consider Hall's Kitchen; you won't  be disappointed.

recentReviews.text: The most consistent Gluten-Free pizza we have found.

Bourbon street pizza could not have impressed me more over the years. No matter if I sit in, carry out or deliver I am always treated with respect and the pizza is always amazing. Never a miss with these guys & girls. 6 Stars!

Tried this place for the first time.. ordered 2 pizzas.. 1 supreme and one pineapple and sausage and it was phenomenal! Sauce, cheese, a lot of toppings! I'm not a crust guy and even the crust was goodüòÇüòÇ and for a really good price

This place is amazing! we order food from there often.  we like the pizza and a the pasta dishes. The salads to. I don't think we have had a bad .meal from there yet
You all should try it

I stumbled across this pizza place and I am soooo glad I did!! I love pizza, have tried most every pizza in town, but let me tell you‚Ä¶.NONE of them compare to Halls Pizza and Subs!!! The pizza is just the best, the flavor is amazing!! And the breadsticks‚Ä¶.ooohhh soooo good!!! If you are looking for some great pizza at a good price, do yourself a favor and give them a try, I promise you it will be great!!!

detailedReviews.author: Daryn Pobanz
detailedReviews.text: The most consistent Gluten-Free pizza we have found.

detailedReviews.author: Eric Frickson
detailedReviews.text: Bourbon street pizza could not have impressed me more over the years. No matter if I sit in, carry out or deliver I am always treated with respect and the pizza is always amazing. Never a miss with these guys & girls. 6 Stars!

detailedReviews.author: Cody Takacs
detailedReviews.text: Tried this place for the first time.. ordered 2 pizzas.. 1 supreme and one pineapple and sausage and it was phenomenal! Sauce, cheese, a lot of toppings! I'm not a crust guy and even the crust was goodüòÇüòÇ and for a really good price

detailedReviews.author: kim shaw
detailedReviews.text:
This place is amazing! we order food from there often.  we like the pizza and a the pasta dishes. The salads to. I don't think we have had a bad .meal from there yet
You all should try it

detailedReviews.author: Laura Osterman
detailedReviews.text: I stumbled across this pizza place and I am soooo glad I did!! I love pizza, have tried most every pizza in town, but let me tell you‚Ä¶.NONE of them compare to Halls Pizza and Subs!!! The pizza is just the best, the flavor is amazing!! And the breadsticks‚Ä¶.ooohhh soooo good!!! If you are looking for some great pizza at a good price, do yourself a favor and give them a try, I promise you it will be great!!!

detailedReviews.author: Keesia Curtis
detailedReviews.text: Great Atmosphere and Customer Service

detailedReviews.author: Megan T
detailedReviews.text: Great zza!!! Great staff!!! Clean store, what else doI need to say!!! Subscribe great coupons too!!!

detailedReviews.author: Aurelie Delavignette
detailedReviews.text: Gave me food poisoning. Contacted them three times and they still haven't gotten back to me.

detailedReviews.author: keziumo
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the 574

detailedReviews.author: E Lanham
detailedReviews.text: Greatest pizza with greatest deals!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Jaworski
detailedReviews.text:
First time visit at 10 p.m. Wow, this restaurant had the most wonderful pizza and bread sticks! Unique flavors that were really tasty. We will definitely go back. We drove over from the far west side of South Bend. We'll worth the trip! We love thin cracker crust on a pizza and they delivered that special crunch. Tomato sauce was extra good.

If you've never tried them, please consider Hall's Kitchen; you won't  be disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: andrina nyengo
detailedReviews.text: I came in about a month ago to get a buffalo chicken pizza, when I got home the pizza was chicken and cheese, no onion, no bacon, aka not the pizza I ordered. I called back they offered a remake but I was already home 15 mins away, so I declined and asked for a $10 credit. Employee said okay I can do that for you. So when I call to place an order and redeem my credit, I‚Äôm told that employee is not a manager and can not grant credits, not only that I‚Äôm told that they ‚Äúdon‚Äôt give out free food and their not giving me anything‚Äù. So not only am I being disrespected, but now made to look like I just want a freebie. Super weird behavior from the night shift manager KZ or whatever their name was. I solely order pizza from this place because it is peak and I love the service, but rn I‚Äôm not feeling the business I give is really appreciated. Which is very frustrating, I shouldn‚Äôt have to overly explain for the mistakes you guys made. It makes me uncomfortable and quite frankly it‚Äôs not customer satisfaction. I‚Äôve worked pizza, fast food, fine dining and I just wouldn‚Äôt treat people this way. Especially when you can see my reoccurring orders!

detailedReviews.author: Chip
detailedReviews.text: Never been disappointed. Fantastic pizza and subs. Delivery has always been quick.

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Turner
detailedReviews.text:
Not only do I love Halls Kitchen, my entire family does. A few of my favorites are the taco pizza (pictured), sandwiches, their gluten free pasta with meatballs, and breadsticks. All around the pizza is delicious, we‚Äôve never had a bad order that I can recall.

They don‚Äôt deliver to my area however it‚Äôs worth the drive each time.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Elkins
detailedReviews.text: Hall‚Äôs Pizza absolutely nailed it! The Hawaiian pizza was incredible‚Äîcrispy crust, tangy sauce, and the perfect balance of sweet pineapple and savory ham. Every bite was fresh and flavorful. The staff was friendly, service was quick, and the place had a great laid-back vibe. Easily one of the best pizzas I‚Äôve had in a long time. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

detailedReviews.author: Kyla Beresford
detailedReviews.text: Alway consistent in quality and great service.

detailedReviews.author: Nizami Barton
detailedReviews.text: There is almost no toppings on the pizza i had sausage bacon and onion and it's 70% cheese. The pizza isn't anything special you folks in southbend must be used to trash. The wings are the worst Ive ever had it was rubbery like Tyson's chicken! Are we not gonna fry them at all? Im from out of state and this was worst 50$ Ive ever spent. Sad too cuz I wanted a go to out here.

detailedReviews.author: Tim C
detailedReviews.text: First time visiting. Good pizza. Friendly staff. Will be back in the future.

detailedReviews.author: Clara Ross
detailedReviews.text: It was spectacular!  Great price, kind and friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: John T
detailedReviews.text: This is the only place in South Bend I have found that does pizza right. The crust that is formed from the dough is my favorite part. You pay a bit more, but they quality is definitely there. This is my go-to place for pizza in the city.

detailedReviews.author: Sue Newland
detailedReviews.text: They have the best food.This is the only pizza we eat! The pastas and hot sandwiches are awesome too!

detailedReviews.author: Kami
detailedReviews.text: Best wings! Pizza is full of flavor and staff is the best

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Miller
detailedReviews.text: best local pizza place

detailedReviews.author: Kathleen
detailedReviews.text: The food at Hall‚Äôs Kitchen is excellent. The pizza and subs are flavorful and every bite is sensational. The staff are friendly and the restaurant is clean.

detailedReviews.author: William Thomas
detailedReviews.text:
I order pizza from Hall‚Äôs from time to time,  normally 3 pizzas at a time and I have never been treated so rudely. Although my pizza was paid for and ready and sitting on the counter she made me wait until she helped another customer who was behind me although the pizza was 15 minutes late ( I ordered 1.5 hours in advance). She didn‚Äôt close the boxes all the way, I had to do myself. I was taking the pizza to a job site for a construction crew so I asked for the cheap paper plates they always give me and she went to the back to ask the guy if it was okay. I asked for some red pepper and parmesan and she said rudely she was only giving me 1 per pizza and would have to charge me for any extra. Wow, up until today their service has been good not as good as the SB location but nothing to complain about for sure.

Although the pizza was delicious and everyone on the job-site enjoyed it, I will be visiting Barnaby‚Äôs next time I am working in the area and buying for  a the construction crew as she made sure I wasn‚Äôt welcome in her restaurant. Thanks.

detailedReviews.author: Dan McGarvie
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza and cheese bread. I will be back!!!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Mcfadden
detailedReviews.text: I'm so sad to have to share this story about the way I was treated and the public safety hazard! As I was waiting for my REMAKE of a steak and cheese from THIER MISTAKE from the previous day. I came back inside after the 10 minutes to see a child around 7 to 9 years old Bare Hands grab veggies out of the make table and dip it straight in the ranch on the make table!!! Gross. She looks straight at me I said she can't do that. The little girl ran to the back. The lady looked at me and said that's the owner's daughter you can't say that to her. I said that's disgusting and it's a health violation. I asked him if his employees were allowed to do that and he replied " absolutely not" then I said when why is she allowed to do that? The owner comes out grabs my food throws it straight in the trash. I never received my remake or my money then he called the police. So yes the food is decent but you never know who's little fingers are in there. So you got your own risk. I feel like they robbed me!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Brittney Fox
detailedReviews.text:
Stopped here for a late dinner after visiting the Potawatomi Zoo. Nice little restaurant, lots of options to choose from. Different pizzas, subs and pastas. Kids Mac n cheese is big enough to share!! Cheesy and flavorful. Lady was nice enough to put our 2yr olds in the freezer for a few to cool down. Also gave all 3 of our girls popsicles. Basket of garlic bread was also very too.
We got the chicken bacon ranch, chicken Alfredo and supreme pizzas. Everything was very tasty, cheesy and flavorful. Hope to stop again in the future...!!

detailedReviews.author: Brenda Heap
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!!  They say 25 minutes, it's ready in 25.  Live this pizza place I've been to 3 of their locations

detailedReviews.author: Steve Searfoss
detailedReviews.text: Pizza & garlic breadsticks are excellent and priced fairly.

detailedReviews.author: Steve Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Quick, clean, and great Italian sun!

detailedReviews.author: Donna Rock
detailedReviews.text: Yummy!üòÅ

detailedReviews.author: Elsa Hack
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food and quick

detailedReviews.author: Arianna Holiday
detailedReviews.text: Amazing deals for pizza 24/7, and it‚Äôs delicious! Service is excellent. My boyfriend and I placed an order, and somehow it didn‚Äôt make it through, and Jeff helped us and we left very happy! We will always be returning back!

detailedReviews.author: Jeremiah Sult
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, subs, and wings! Great addition to our area! Has become our go to for lunches and dinners.

detailedReviews.author: Krystal Kourlas
detailedReviews.text: Got a pizza and cheese bread it was really good for local pizza ...to me nothing out of the ordinary but that not a bad thing.

detailedReviews.author: Mark Pedzinski
detailedReviews.text: Great food.... parking sucks... but good food!

detailedReviews.author: Meagan Price
detailedReviews.text: We love Hall‚Äôs Kitchen! Our go to pizza place in the South Bend area!

detailedReviews.author: Arlenne Esbeidy
detailedReviews.text: Love their crispy pepperoni pizza was fire and good price

detailedReviews.author: Shannon Schonscheck
detailedReviews.text:
Ryan Hall‚Äôs Pizza Joint is hands down the best in South Bend!

The tray of pizza was loaded, the sauce was delicious, and everything was fresh and full of flavor.

Can‚Äôt beat it!

Plus, Ryan is a great guy to work for too‚Äîhardworking and down-to-earth.

If you haven‚Äôt tried his pizza yet, you‚Äôre seriously missing out!

‚Äî Shannon Marie Klare Schonscheck

detailedReviews.author: M W
detailedReviews.text: Had delivery and wasn't able to apply my coupon. Paid the full bill then called to store and they promptly fixed it. Delivery was early too. Everything we've gotten from Hall's has been delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Paula Williams
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is really good as long as you get extra cheese that's the only downfall they don't put enough cheese unless you order extra cheese

detailedReviews.author: J Mykal
detailedReviews.text:
Been eating their pizza for years and decided to hook them up with a review üôÇ.  I love their pizza. I love their prices. I love their pastas. I love their sauces. I love that it‚Äôs always hot when it shows up. I love that I decided not to use proper grammar and neglected to throw some commas in this review. Keep up the great work Hall‚Äôs Kitchen üëèüëèüëè.

detailedReviews.author: We Are Calloused
detailedReviews.text: Everything about this place is undeniable. Staff is so friendly and timely. Sooooo affordablw AND tastes better than dang bear everywhret

detailedReviews.author: Rex Washington
detailedReviews.text: Great local pizza place - but their salads and subs are even better and a REAL deal price wise! Check them out!

detailedReviews.author: Bruce Cramer
detailedReviews.text: No complaints!

detailedReviews.author: Douglas
detailedReviews.text: A1 like usual

detailedReviews.author: Rob Barbieri
detailedReviews.text: I've gotten Halls Pizza numerous times but I've really only had one problem, and it was last night (6/7/2025). I walked in said I was here to pick up a paid for online order under my name, Robert. The guy at the counter grabs a pizza box and a foam container, which I thought was odd since I ordered 14 inch pepperoni and sausage and some cheesy breadsticks which normally both come in cardboard pizza boxes. He then opened the foam box and it was garlic bread. I just shrugged it off, their garlic bread is good, it's about the same price and I'd rather just get home. I asked for some paper plates and the guy helping said "Sure, how do you want to pay?". I've never had to pay for paper plates before but that Orange Chicken in office has kinda effed up the economy so not really all that surprising to be asked to pay a buck for them, I tell him card and he says you can go ahead and tap my card. I do so and I'm then show a screen saying I just paid $23! I immediately ask what did I just pay for and he said "your order". I then told the guy helping me, no that doesn't make sense, I paid for my food when I ordered using the Toast app. The guy got immediately argumentative saying that's my order it says my name on the receipt. I look at the receipt and the name showing is for a "Roberta" not a "Robert" and the order isn't even right (who the hell orders a pepperoni sausage pizza with nacho cheese sauce?). I reiterate explain thats not my name nor my order and the guy doubled down saying it was. No, dumba**, I know my own name, I've had it for 30+ years. I had to get my phone and pull up the toast app and show him my actual order receipt. The manager then comes over to see what's going on and I explain the issue, she looks at whatever kitchen management system they use and said they'll remake my order and refund the charge. I honestly should have just told them to refund me for both orders cause sitting and waiting for 10-15 minutes for them to remake my order just sucked. I finally got my pizza and when they handed it over they gave such an insincere "sorry for the mix up" it just pissed me off further. I won't be back anytime soon, which blows because the pizza and cheesy bread were actually quite good, but that service left an even worse taste in my mouth, and now I have to watch it make sure I actually do get a refund in 7-10 days ü§¨

detailedReviews.author: paula kelly
detailedReviews.text: Fixed the pizza wrong.   Very rude.  Did not care about their mistake.  Never go there.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Lang
detailedReviews.text: The staff forgot to make half my order and one guy gave me an attitude when I said I didn't want to wait while my pizza sat in a warmer.  Another employee was insulting another employee by calling him names that had no business being said in the workplace, especially within earshot of customers.

detailedReviews.author: Dinkle Boomba
detailedReviews.text: I totally love this place! Best pizza in South bend!

detailedReviews.author: Queen Pie
detailedReviews.text: So yum is the pizza and actually all of the menu also fair prices and real deals and specials updated weekly they also have an excellent points system that rewards with deep discounts and free food, I really love that!!! Friendly service! Cute owner üòç

detailedReviews.author: tilicki john
detailedReviews.text: Finally, after being disappointed by every other pizza place in South Bend, I found a good one. The crust is made right, the sauce is flavored well, and the cheese is soooooo good! I recommend this place above any other place in South Bend. It's a big pricey, but the quality product is there.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Ciula
detailedReviews.text:
I've gotten pizzas, subs, pasta, and cheese bread there. Always on time, always great tasting!
My favorite is the Italian beef sub üòãüòã

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Kline
detailedReviews.text: We ordered take our.   It was ready when we arrived.   We got a Hawaiian and pepperoni pizza. Both were delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Justin Francken
detailedReviews.text: We were in town visiting. Asked a local about some good pizza places. He suggested halls kitchen. We tried it and was it great! The manager was friendly and chatted with us about the Packers and helped us decide what to get. We went with a Hawaiian pizza and loaded cheesy bread. The sauce was fabulous and that really made our pizza stand out!! Their marinara sauce was amazing and extremely well priced!!!! Wish we had one closer to us!! Thanks again for dinner!!

detailedReviews.author: Chastity Watkins
detailedReviews.text: First time eating thre and it was great along with the staff

detailedReviews.author: Tonya Neeley -Lewis
detailedReviews.text: Always good food good service and atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Antonia Anderson
detailedReviews.text: Fast, friendly service and good food!

detailedReviews.author: Jared Edge
detailedReviews.text: Always Great food

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Hohalek
detailedReviews.text: Easy to order online. Food is always great. The coupon texts are so helpful when ordering for a big family. Our go to place üíö

detailedReviews.author: miranda thompson
detailedReviews.text: Halls has been my favortie pizza place for a while now. However THE SALADS omg to die for !!! One salad can feed 2 people or more depending on the apetite. They are so good and affordable. The only thing i would change is maby add crutons and sunflower seeds that would make it perfect !!!! Love it keep up the good work

detailedReviews.author: Tess B
detailedReviews.text: My husband told me about 5 times how good that pizza was! The variety to choose from! My husband doesn‚Äôt like pizza sauce. He did Buffalo which is usual for anywhere he orders. But for him to tell me multiple times how good it was. I was pretty surprised!

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Ford
detailedReviews.text: Pepperoni pizza, hot ham and cheese, French dip. Delish. Kids loved the food too. Git you sum.

detailedReviews.author: leslie wikstrom
detailedReviews.text: Fast delivery and excellent subs. Pizza and breadsticks are very good also

detailedReviews.author: Claude Byers Jr
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was killer, food came out fast hot and fresh... Alfredo was good too ... Staff was friendly, and joking around even tho they were clearly busy ... Hands down would go again next time were in town

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Sweeney
detailedReviews.text: Quick fast and good. Friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: Michael Shakour
detailedReviews.text: We have Hall‚Äôs weekly. It‚Äôs our go to place for quality and price. I strongly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Marcy Gomez
detailedReviews.text: By far my favorite pizza! I have tired the pizza, subs, salads, bread sticks and pasta. They all are AMAZING!

detailedReviews.author: G T
detailedReviews.text: The meatball sub made me sick, the taco salad has no business being over 10 bucks, and all the employees did was complain about their job while I waited over 15 mins for 5 min food...

detailedReviews.author: Janee
detailedReviews.text: 10 for 10 would definitely recommend.  The service was fast, the cashier was friendly and the food is good.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the amazing flavor and quality of the pizza, including unique flavors and a satisfying thin cracker crust. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is known for its excellent customer service, whether dining in, carrying out, or having food delivered. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Customers appreciate the great deals and value for money offered by the restaurant. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, including unresolved customer complaints and poor service experiences - review management can address this concern
Incorrect orders and poor handling of customer complaints, leading to dissatisfaction and loss of repeat business - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Health and safety concerns, such as improper food handling witnessed by customers - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Daryn Pobanz
positive.text: The most consistent Gluten-Free pizza we have found.

negative.author: Aurelie Delavignette
negative.text: Gave me food poisoning. Contacted them three times and they still haven't gotten back to me.

I called back they offered a remake but I was already home 15 mins away, so I declined and asked for a $10 credit. Employee said okay I can do that for you. So not only am I being disrespected, but now made to look like I just want a freebie. Super weird behavior from the night shift manager KZ or whatever their name was. negative.text: There is almost no toppings on the pizza i had sausage bacon and onion and it's 70% cheese. The pizza isn't anything special you folks in southbend must be used to trash. recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
